summary: TREAD SEPARATED FROM REST OF TIRE WHILE TRAVELING DOWN HIGHWAY. DO NOT BELIEVE TIRE WENT FLAT BEFORE SEPARATION. ROAD WAS PAVED. AIR TEMP WAS IN MID 90 DEGREE RANGE. TIRE WAS NOT LOW ON AIR PRESSURE. THIS TIRE WAS ON A BOAT TRAILER. ORIGINAL TIRE WHICH CAME WITH TRAILER.( DOT NUMBER: VDHL1M349 TIRE SIZE: P235/75R15 )
